Class FiniteGraphA

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--MathSystem
        |
        +--FiniteGraphA
public class FiniteGraphA
extends MathSystem

This class represents Rotor Router system on a graph with four vertices, two of which are sinks. Copyright (C) 2003-2004 Hal Canary, University of Wisconsin-Madison
